title: Alexandra Cirone on Post-Truth Politics
itunes:author: Alexandra Cirone
description: Contributor(s): Alexandra Cirone | What is 'Post-Truth'? Alexandra Cirone discusses the latest political buzzword and what it really means for politics in 2016 and beyond.
